name: Bell Boy Hotel - Audio Based Game For Blind Gamers
name_original: Bell Boy Hotel - Audio Based Game For Blind Gamers
description:
This is an interactive audio based game where you play the role as a hotel bell-boy. Your task is to look after the guests and try to get as many tips as you can.

This game has many tasks that are chosen at random, allowing the game to be played again and again.

Suitable for gamers who are blind or have vision issues.

For info on my games, please visit: www.EasyToPlayGames.com
